task.title: Fix thread messages not delivered to agents and not rendered in dashboard

events.content: Added channel field to Rust SDK ThreadReplyEvent: Added channel field to Rust SDK ThreadReplyEvent

raw.question: Added channel field to Rust SDK ThreadReplyEvent
raw.chosen: Added channel field to Rust SDK ThreadReplyEvent
raw.reasoning: The server sends channel in thread.reply events but the Rust SDK struct was missing it, causing the broker to fall back to synthetic target 'thread' which broke dashboard routing

events.content: Override display_target in broker main loop for thread replies: Override display_target in broker main loop for thread replies

raw.question: Override display_target in broker main loop for thread replies
raw.chosen: Override display_target in broker main loop for thread replies
raw.reasoning: Even with the SDK fix, added a safety net in main.rs that extracts the raw WS channel field and overrides display_target when it is 'thread' (synthetic) so the dashboard routes messages correctly
